description: Brief frame drops during large team fights with lots of champion abilities.
name: League of Legends

description: Brief frame drops from smoke grenades and explosions.
name: Counter-Strike 2

description: In GTA Online, FPS may drop due to increased CPU load.
name: Grand Theft Auto V

description: FPS depends on render distance, world complexity, and mod usage, with CPU-intensive world generation.
name: Minecraft

description: Brief stutters during late-game team fights with many active abilities.
name: Dota 2

description: FPS can be affected by high mouse polling rates, certain agent abilities and the Vanguard anti-cheat system's CPU usage.
name: Valorant

description: Complex building mechanics and large-scale events can lead to variable performance, especially on lower-end systems.
name: Fortnite

description: Performance varies by zone complexity and player density, with raids and cities potentially causing frame drops.
name: World of Warcraft

description: Intense team fights and high particle effects may result in frame rate inconsistencies.
name: Overwatch 2

description: Atmospheric bayou environments with advanced audio processing can impact performance, especially during PvP encounters.
name: Hunt: Showdown

description: Performance may dip during complex combat scenarios.
name: Apex Legends

description: Generally stable performance but can struggle with many tanks and effects during large battles.
name: World of Tanks

description: Large map sizes and high player counts can impact performance, causing FPS drops during peak activity.
name: Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0

description: Large map streaming and 100-player matches create variable performance, especially during hot drops and final circle scenarios.
name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds

description: Lightweight and well-optimized for competitive play, maintaining stable performance across various hardware configurations.
name: Rocket League

description: FPS can vary based on server population, built bases, and map size.
name: Rust

description: Performance drops during intense firefights and busy raids.
name: Escape From Tarkov

description: Competitive-focused optimization provides stable performance, though destructible environments can impact frames during heavy destruction.
name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege

description: Fast-paced multiplayer combat with dynamic destruction and advanced particle effects can cause frame drops during intense firefights and larger game modes.
name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6

description: Ability-heavy gameplay with screen-filling effects can cause frame drops during large raid encounters with many players.
name: Lost Ark

description: Large-scale PvP battles and town areas with many players can cause significant performance drops.
name: New World

description: Capped at 60 FPS by default; can be unlocked via mods requiring offline play.
name: Elden Ring

description: Raids and public events with many players and visual effects can impact performance during peak activity periods.
name: Destiny 2

description: FPS drops during multi-monster hunts and environmental effects.
name: Monster Hunter Wilds

description: Vehicle-heavy battles with many explosions and effects can impact performance during large-scale engagements.
name: War Thunder

description: Ocean simulation and ship physics can impact performance during storms and large naval battles.
name: Sea of Thieves

description: Urban environments with many interactive elements and effects can cause performance fluctuations during firefights.
name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2

description: Extremely detailed world simulation including weather, wildlife, and NPC behavior creates heavy system load throughout gameplay.
name: Red Dead Redemption 2

description: Turn-based combat with many spell effects and detailed environments can cause performance drops during large battles.
name: Baldur's Gate 3

description: Poorly optimized and extremely demanding, but benefits greatly from DLSS/FSR upscaling and frame generation.
name: Borderlands 4

description: Procedurally generated worlds and building mechanics can cause performance issues in heavily built areas and during storms.
name: Valheim

description: Horror atmosphere with detailed character models can impact performance during intense encounter sequences.
name: Resident Evil Village

description: Demanding visuals and ray tracing support can severely reduce FPS, especially in city environments.
name: Cyberpunk 2077

description: Magical effects and detailed castle environments can impact performance, especially during spell-heavy combat sequences.
name: Hogwarts Legacy

description: Beautiful Japanese landscapes with advanced wind simulation can occasionally stress systems during large battles.
name: Ghost of Tsushima

description: Screen-filling spell effects and large demon hordes can impact performance during intense dungeon encounters.
name: Diablo IV

description: Performance is significantly lower during battle scenes compared to free roam, with FPS often cut nearly in half.
name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

description: Cooperative combat with screen-filling explosions and effects can impact performance during intense bug battles.
name: Helldivers 2

description: Post-apocalyptic environments with advanced character detail can stress systems during infected encounters.

description: Intense action sequences with many enemies and effects can occasionally impact performance during boss battles.
